website_summaries.verdict: Affordably priced, this table is just large enough to give you a nice little space on the beach.
pros: Easy to fold and set up
cons: The top is mesh and not terribly sturdy
You may want to add some kind of table board to make it flat

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.  Does exactly what you want it to do.
customer_reviews.text: It's solid, works great in the beach, and makes a beach trip awesome. It's also light and small enough that you don't notice you're carrying it. Everyone thinks I am weird for owning this until I open it up and put beach snack and drinks on it...then everyone wants one of their own. It looks nice, it's high quality, and the prices is amazing. Unlike RIO Brands table, this one is pretty stable if someone bumps into it. It's perfect for light duty use (keeping ipads, snacks, drinks, etc). It's also easy to get back into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alli Baba

customer_reviews.title: Yeah. Okay. Everyone likes it. But I didn't.
customer_reviews.text: 1) Even with the shock cords, it's a pain to put together. Especially the table top cross-bars as they are under compression. They want to slip out of position on their own accord. 2) With ALL bars fully and completely set in place, there is a gap on one of the table top cross-bars. Yet another product that is poorly manufactured in China.
customer_reviews.author: CorporateBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and compact
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this table to take to bonfires/beach/camping. This table is compact, light weights and sturdy. Taking this to the beach was perfect as it comes in a carrying bag. The table is easy to put together, aluminum frame, mesh/fabric top with has cup holders and mesh pockets on the side! Impressive compact folding table.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and light weight
customer_reviews.text: Camped in the backyard this week (the whole stay at home deal) the table worked great for the grandkids. They ate on it, with the very sturdy cup holders, and played games on it also , great gadget for the rver or dry camper compacts into a small carry bag for easy handling It is now in the trailer for the next outing.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Douglas

customer_reviews.title: As good as Helinox table, but at a better price!
customer_reviews.text: This folding table is as good as Helinox Table, but at a better price. It's the very cheap and fine table I've been looking for. It is very well designed and constructed and I especially like the cup holders. It's very easy to set up, because there is no tools needed. Really nice for a picnic or camping, strong and durable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: winston wu

customer_reviews.title: Good little table.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a portable table for my portable ham radio setup. I set it and a similar chair up on my front porch this afternoon. After a couple hours I like it. It's a bit shorter than I pictured but as advertised. Seems strong enough for it's weight and small pack size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact Size
customer_reviews.text: Neat little camp table. I actually bought this to take to the beach as thought it would be easier to clean off any sand. Very light weight and sturdy. Seems to be just the right height for when you are sitting on the ground or low in a chair. Took it right out of the little carry bag and set it up in now time.
customer_reviews.author: MCleveland

customer_reviews.title: Compact handy table
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily. It’s smaller than I thought it would be but that was my fault - it’s as described. Haven’t used it a lot yet but seems well put together. Will be great for beach with grandkids or concerts in the park or other events. Light weight and compact. Easy to bring along.
customer_reviews.author: Aim C

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the beach and I love it! The setup was super easy I didn't even check if there was instructions. I set it up in my living room and placed a bottle of wine and a box of crackers all on one side and the little table kept it's balance. The cup openings are a good size and side pockets are nice as well. I set this up at the beach and it was easy set up and looked awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimito El Cartero

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as pictured. It was very easy to assemble (no instructions included) and fits nicely in its own bag. It seems sturdy for being so lightweight and I gave it 4 stars because I haven’t used it yet. I bought it for camping to use in the tent like a nightstand between the family air beds. I’ll report back after use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome new backpacking equipment
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works amazing, keep away from fires it will make holes in it.
customer_reviews.author: Georgeofthejungle

customer_reviews.title: great camping table at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This looks nearly identical to the brand name product that costs 3 times as much. While I would not call this table cheap it is certainly more affordable than similar products. So far I have found it to be very easy to set up and sturdy. It can easily hold dinner plates or keep a bag off the ground. I don't want to try using it as a stool but it might work. It is light and packs up small, so it is a nice balance between keeping the weight down and having some comfort items.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald P

customer_reviews.title: Great little table
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Super lightweight, easy set up and breakdown. I like the center mounted cup holders, there not in the way when using the table and keeps the table steady when removing one drink unlike the tables with corner mounted cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Looper

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving, Great for Camp
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and weight. The packed size of this table is smaller than any I've bought before. It doesn't take up any space which is the best since we are using it for our camper van and we have very little storage. Highly recommended for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: calvin c beck

customer_reviews.title: Super light and sturdy out the box
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect. Have not used it at beach yet but seems like it will be exactly what I wanted. Use review to follow Very light. And comes with nice carry case.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Portable Camping Table
customer_reviews.text: This portable camping table is awesome. It's smaller than expected but it's perfect for our climbing trips! It works great, is light weight, and super compact. Easily fit into my climbing pack with out adding bulk to my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Breakfast & Munchies

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love the table, cup holders on the top instead of underneath like other tables is a huge bonus. The table works great on the beach even on a windy day!
customer_reviews.author: Marni Steltz

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and Sturdy, but not too easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like this camp table because it is very light weight and still quite sturdy. However, it requires some patience to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Yee H Shuai

customer_reviews.title: Setups up quick and is very light!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camping table, it’s the perfect height for all our camp chairs and is very sturdy and packs up very small
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great table at an awesome price point.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpacking and motorcycle camping table. I use it for motorcycle camping and folds up smaller than my chair. It is similar in size to helinox table but sooo much cheaper. It is sturdy, with nice water holders and my jetboil rests nicely in between the metal rail.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping and tailgating!
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect for the camping season and tailgating for sports events.
customer_reviews.author: Massimo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s surprisingly sturdy and I didn’t even have to look at directions to put it together. Very nice item!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Hartman

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING like Helinox
customer_reviews.text: NOTHING like Helinox. Bought this to take to the beach. Have used three times, at which time the chord holding the legs has begun to unravel pending total tear. It will not be possible to use the table again, as all is dependent upon the strain of the chord within the legs. Very disappointing...I guess you get what you pay for...Cheap
customer_reviews.author: Einat T.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable beach table
customer_reviews.text: We’ve only used it once but it was lightweight, easy to set up & disassemble (+ self explanatory), and was functional for our use. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: shoppe-a-holick

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: If it were easier to assemble we would use it more
customer_reviews.author: patty

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time when going on bike rides. Fits in saddlebags nicely! Sturdy table when set up!
customer_reviews.author: Sbykeriders

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Fits in a backpack and great for a day hike.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we need for our days on the beach. It small and easy to carry and easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: sharon mcgirr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light table, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light table, build quality fells really good. Took it backpacking and very pleased to use it! Awesome little table!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit,
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to set up at first, almost seemed like one of the sides of fabric was a little shorter than the other. I know it needs tension, but even holding it up, I could tell the difference. After struggling for a bit, I got it to work. It's really light weight and folds up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Mamazon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little table and customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping! Exactly what we needed. Would highly recommend this little table and you don’t have to spend $100 at a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, lightweight and packable. Definitely recommend for an addition to your camping gear.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Daiek

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I use this table every time I go to the beach. It is beach chair height. Takes about 30 seconds to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lulou

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, lightweight small table
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, a cinch to assemble, but the useable surface is very small and it must be set up on an absolutely flat surface
customer_reviews.author: NS

customer_reviews.title: Big table in light weight package
customer_reviews.text: Just received this cool light weight portable table. It was easy to assemble and we are pleased, saying that we haven’t used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Table
customer_reviews.text: I hike with my drone and needed a table and chair that would fit in my backpack along with all my drone equipment that would be lite and sturdy. This table packs small and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Buchheit

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product! It fits perfectly in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camping table
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camping table! Saved a lot of money purchasing this instead of Helionix. Only other camping table that I found to break down as small.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight yet sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for an extra sturdy side table to take to the beach or camping!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Mays

customer_reviews.title: Check the size
customer_reviews.text: I thought the table would be a little bigger, but will work for 2 people. Very light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Easy To Set Up
customer_reviews.text: The table is perfect for camping. Coffee table height and large enough for two plates and two cups.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Luthin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble without thinking it's going to break. No directions.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ng

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight Sturdy Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Used at home and beach. So light. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Juicy Jorma

customer_reviews.title: Great camp table
customer_reviews.text: Great table. Love the cup holders. Blue anodized finish is a nice color that won't get old. Set up is fast. Weighs next to nothing
customer_reviews.author: airtime4

customer_reviews.title: Easy, convenient and great for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with the intent for the kids to eat lunch on the beach, and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: FRUITEAM Potable Camp Table Picnic Folding Beach Table for Camping Hiking …
feature_bullets: ULTRALIGHT & PORTABLE - Camping table is weighted only 26ounces, lightweight and portable for wherever you go like picnic, camping, fishing. This backpacking table folds into its carry bag of 16. 5"×5", packing it into your luggage conveniently.

PRACTICAL & UNIQUE - The camp table ultralight unfolds to 23. 2"x15. 8"x15. 3", which can place enough objects. Here are two cup holders, ensuring the great breathability and heat dissipation if cup is hot.

STURDY & DURABLE - This picnic table is made of thicken 600D oxford fabric, which is much sturdier and more durable. With special aluminum shock-cord pole frame, the picnic table can support up to 66lbs(30kg).

EASY TO SETUP - NO TOOLS NEEDED! The aluminum base frame is designed to pop up and fold with ease. Its unique hinge design and robust connection helps table setup a lot. Just pop the frame open and attach the camping table fabric.

MUCH MORE STABLE - There are strict product testings on the stability of FRUITEAM folding beach table so that it was permitted to leave the factory. The flat tabletop and stable standup keep items placing stably.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
